channel.title: DevilsScape 562 Loading 668
channel.description:
Homepage: http://DevilsScape.com/portal.php Forums: http://DevilsScape.com/forum Donations Page: http://DevilsScape.com/donate.php Webclient: http://DevilsScape.com/webclient.php
Features: 24/7 Nex VPS Hosted Dedicated Owner No Lag All 25 Skills Working Custom Bosses Mini Boss pets Custom Items Prestige Skill Bandos Torva Virtus Pernix ::yellzone (to get yells) ::loyaltyzone (to get awesome cool custom player titles) ::petzone (to get awesome mini boss pets and tz-rek jad) ::warriorzone (to get Bandos armor, torso, etc.) Correct Dungeoneering - 120/120 Zombies Minigame ::minigame (to get pvp armor and Dice bag) Dicing Gambler NPC (That's right, an NPC that rolls the dice for your pot!) A lot of Custom Quests (Donator and non-Donator) Awesome Forums Dedicated Staff Active and great community MONEY POUCH - THAT'S RIGHT, THE ONLY 562 WITH MONEY POUCH. NPC GFX Correctly working All Dupes patched Amazing bosses! Corp Jad Giant Jad Giant Nex Mini nex Giant glod Giant nomad Wildy Wyrm
Time for pics! (and yes, i am the owner of this server)
Custom Client: [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/CustomClient.jpg[/img]
Mini Boss pets(Mini nex :D also, the dude in the golden mining is an npc too :P): [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/MiniNex.jpg[/img]
Random pic of Nex: [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/Nex.jpg[/img]
Prestige System: [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/Prestiging.jpg[/img]
PM System(Real private messaging works too but this is an alternative): [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/CustomPMINGSystem.jpg[/img]
More of PM System: [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/PMSystem.jpg[/img]
HD and fullscreen fully working: [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/HDandfullscreen.jpg[/img]
x10 Hits option when client is started up.: [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/x10hitsoption.jpg[/img]
That's all for now, i'll be adding more pics later, Hope you guys enjoy this server!!!

item.title: DevilsScape 562 Loading 668
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

stevie0444:

I’m British and I think I should get mod mate people need help and American time it’s 4am and for me it’s 10am , Jw mate … IGN: G claws

I’m Chinese so I get owner.

Lol, race doesn’t matter.

Read full topic
